text: The United States Senate Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Water and Power is one of four subcommittees of the U.S. Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee. This subcommittee's includes oversight and legislative responsibilities for: United States Bureau of Reclamation irrigation and reclamation projects, including related flood control purposes and energy development impacts on water resources; groundwater resources and management. ==Current members== Majority Minority *Martha McSally, Arizona, Chairwoman * John Barrasso, Wyoming * Jim Risch, Idaho * Bill Cassidy, Louisiana *Cory Gardner, Colorado *Lamar Alexander, Tennessee *Catherine Cortez Masto, Nevada, Ranking Member * Ron Wyden, Oregon *Maria Cantwell, Washington *Bernie Sanders, VermontSens. King and Sanders are Independents, but caucus with Democrats on the committee. Ex Officio Ex Officio * Lisa Murkowski, Alaska *Joe Manchin, West Virginia ==References== Energy Senate Water and Power
title: United States Senate Energy Subcommittee on Water and Power
